verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

צַ֞ו <WH6680> tzav Command אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, to כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> ba-'Im unto them When ye come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz into the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan זֹ֣את <WH2063> zot likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, (this [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that תִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> tip-Pol that shall fall לָכֶם֙ la-Chem בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> be-na-cha-Lah, unto you for an inheritance אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz [even] the land כְּנַ֖עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an of Canaan לִגְבֻלֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1367> lig-vu-lo-Tei-ha. with the coasts

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall extend לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- quarter נֶ֛גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev Then your south מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> mi-mid-bar- shall be from the wilderness צִ֖ן <WH6790> tzin of Zin עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> ye-Dei along by the coast אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> e-Dom; of Edom וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall extend לָכֶם֙ la-Chem גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul border נֶ֔גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev, and your south מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh shall be the outmost coast יָם־ <WH3220> yom- sea הַמֶּ֖לַח <WH4417> ham-Me-lach of the salt קֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6924> Ke-de-mah. eastward

וְנָסַ֣ב <WH5437> ve-na-Sav shall turn לָכֶם֩ la-Chem הַגְּב֨וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And your border מִנֶּ֜גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev from the south לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה le-ma-'a-Leh עַקְרַבִּים֙ <WH4610> 'ak-rab-Bim of Akrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <WH5674> ve-'A-var and pass on צִ֔נָה <WH6790> Tzi-nah, to Zin; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become קתּֽוֹצְאֹתָ֔יו <WH8444> totz-'o-Tav, and the going forth מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev thereof shall be from the south לְקָדֵ֣שׁ le-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <WH6947> bar-Ne-a'; to Kadeshbarnea וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and shall go on חֲצַר־ cha-tzar- אַדָּ֖ר <WH2692> 'ad-Dar to Hazaraddar וְעָבַ֥ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var and pass on עַצְמֹֽנָה׃ <WH6111> 'atz-Mo-nah. to Azmon

וְנָסַ֧ב <WH5437> ve-na-Sav shall fetch a compass הַגְּב֛וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border מֵעַצְמ֖וֹן <WH6111> me-'atz-Mon from Azmon נַ֣חְלָה <WH5158> Nach-lah unto the river מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> totz-'o-Tav and the goings out הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> hai-Yam-mah. of it shall be at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul border יָ֔ם <WH3220> Yam, And [as for] the western וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall have לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol ye shall even have the great וּגְב֑וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul; for a border זֶֽה־ <WH2088> zeh- this יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul border יָֽם׃ <WH3220> Yam. this shall be your west

וְזֶֽה־ <WH2088> ve-zeh- and this יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul border צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon; And this shall be your north מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> hai-Yam sea הַגָּדֹ֔ל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol, from the great תְּתָא֥וּ <WH8376> te-ta-'U ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem הֹ֥ר <WH2023> hor Hor הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> ha-Har. for you mount

מֵהֹ֣ר <WH2023> me-Hor Hor הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> ha-Har, From mount תְּתָא֖וּ <WH8376> te-ta-'U ye shall point out לְבֹ֣א <WH935> le-Vo [your border] unto the entrance חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> cha-Mat; of Hamath וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become תּוֹצְאֹ֥ת <WH8444> totz-'Ot and the goings forth הַגְּבֻ֖ל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul of the border צְדָֽדָה׃ <WH6657> tze-Da-dah. shall be to Zedad

וְיָצָ֤א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza shall go on הַגְּבֻל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border זִפְרֹ֔נָה <WH2202> zif-Ro-nah, to Ziphron וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> totz-'o-Tav and the goings out חֲצַ֣ר cha-Tzar עֵינָ֑ן <WH2704> 'ei-Nan; of it shall be at Hazarenan זֶֽה־ <WH2088> zeh- This יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul border צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> tza-Fon. this shall be your north

וְהִתְאַוִּיתֶ֥ם <WH184> ve-hit-'av-vi-Tem And ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לִגְב֣וּל <WH1366> lig-Vul border קֵ֑דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah; your east מֵחֲצַ֥ר me-cha-Tzar עֵינָ֖ן <WH2704> 'ei-Nan from Hazarenan שְׁפָֽמָה׃ <WH8221> she-Fa-mah. to Shepham

וְיָרַ֨ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad shall go down הַגְּבֻ֧ל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the coast מִשְּׁפָ֛ם <WH8221> mish-she-Fam from Shepham הָרִבְלָ֖ה <WH7247> ha-riv-Lah to Riblah מִקֶּ֣דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem on the east side לָעָ֑יִן <WH5871> la-'A-yin; of Ain וְיָרַ֣ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad shall descend הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul, and the border וּמָחָ֛ה <WH4229> u-ma-Chah and shall reach עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto כֶּ֥תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef unto the side יָם־ <WH3220> yom- of the sea כִּנֶּ֖רֶת <WH3672> kin-Ne-ret of Chinnereth קֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6924> Ke-de-mah. eastward

וְיָרַ֤ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad shall go down הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <WH3383> hai-yar-De-nah, to Jordan וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> totz-'o-Tav and the goings out יָ֣ם <WH3220> yam sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <WH4417> ham-Me-lach; of it shall be at the salt זֹאת֩ <WH2063> zoT likewise תִּהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz this shall be your land לִגְבֻלֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1367> lig-vu-lo-Tei-ha with the coasts סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. thereof round about

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying זֹ֣את <WH2063> zot likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, This [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתְנַחֲל֤וּ <WH5157> tit-na-cha-Lu which ye shall inherit אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> 'o-Tah בְּגוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> be-go-Ral, by lot אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, which the LORD לָתֵ֛ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <WH8672> le-tish-'At unto the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> ham-mat-Tot tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and to the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <WH4294> ham-mat-Teh. tribe

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לָקְח֞וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu have received מַטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> mat-Teh For the tribe בְנֵ֤י <WH1121> ve-Nei of the children הָראוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> ha-r-'u-ve-Ni of Reuben לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam, of their fathers וּמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-mat-Teh and the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children הַגָּדִ֖י <WH1410> hag-ga-Di of Gad לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit according to the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers וַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi [their inheritance] and half מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mat-Teh the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam. their inheritance

שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei The two הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> ham-mat-Tot tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and the half הַמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> ham-mat-Teh; tribe לָקְח֣וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam, their inheritance מֵעֵ֛בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> le-yar-Den Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> ye-re-Cho [near] Jericho קֵ֥דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah eastward מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah. toward the sunrising פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יִנְחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> yin-cha-Lu which shall divide לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the land אֶלְעָזָר֙ <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar unto you Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נֽוּן׃ <WH5126> Nun. of Nun

וְנָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> ve-na-Si prince אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one נָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> na-Si leader אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one מִמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh; of every tribe תִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> tik-Chu And ye shall take לִנְחֹ֥ל <WH5157> lin-Chol by inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the land

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot And the names הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim; of the men לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh [are] these Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> ka-Lev Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh. of Jephunneh

וּלְמַטֵּה֙ <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh And of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, of Simeon שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El Shemuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֱלִידָ֖ד <WH449> 'e-li-Dad Elidad בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son כִּסְלֽוֹן׃ <WH3692> kis-Lon. of Chislon

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children דָ֖ן <WH1835> dan of Dan נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; And the prince בֻּקִּ֖י <WH1231> buk-Ki Bukki בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יָגְלִֽי׃ <WH3020> ya-ge-Li. of Jogli

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; The prince חַנִּיאֵ֖ל <WH2592> chan-ni-'El Hanniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֵפֹֽד׃ <WH641> 'e-Fod. of Ephod

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; And the prince קְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH7055> ke-mu-'El Kemuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שִׁפְטָֽן׃ <WH8204> shif-Tan. of Shiphtan

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun of Zebulun נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; And the prince אֱלִיצָפָ֖ן <WH469> 'e-li-tza-Fan Elizaphan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פַּרְנָֽךְ׃ <WH6535> par-Nach. of Parnach

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> yi-so-sh-Char of Issachar נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; And the prince פַּלְטִיאֵ֖ל <WH6409> pal-ti-'El Paltiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַזָּֽן׃ <WH5821> 'az-Zan. of Azzan

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> 'a-Sher of Asher נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; And the prince אֲחִיה֖וּד <WH282> 'a-chi-Hud Ahihud בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁלֹמִֽי׃ <WH8015> she-lo-Mi. of Shelomi

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> u-le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li of Naphtali נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> na-Si; And the prince פְּדַהְאֵ֖ל <WH6300> pe-dah-'El Pedahel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud

אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; These [are they] whom the LORD לְנַחֵ֥ל <WH5157> le-na-Chel to divide the inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan פ Peh
